title: Two bugs
body:
My first and FAR more annoying one is that when in game, whenever I try to use smart pings my curser will fly off to some random direction, I have NO idea why it does this, I used a different mouse and I still had the same problem. It mostly goes to the right or top but its getting out of hand! How do I fix it?

My other problem is that whenever I get gifted, when the box with the gift pops up saying "you were gifted" and the little text from a friend, well the sound doesnt play. It did a couple week ago for a short while but I dont know what changed.

replies.body:
The issue with Smart Pings is typically caused by a background app, so I recommend [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to prevent those apps from loading with your PC at boot.

As for the missing sounds, try [running a repair of the client's files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5). Let me know how those steps worked.
